title: Pirate Peril: The First Voyage
description: Eager to escape the earthbound confines of adult rules and responsibilities, eleven year old Mike Jones runs away to the Nether World with pirate Captain Dreadful to seek a new life in a strange and magical land from the time of King Arthur.  Many surprises and challenges await him as he meets peasants and princesses, witches and kings. Some try to kill him. Some teach him about heroism.
author: Douglas Derrer
